content: @simulacrum @pnkfelix I’ve added a PR to remove the python triage script https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/pull/908. I’d like to really encourage us to not use the script anymore, since functionality is really going to start to diverge. If we encounter problems with the endpoint, we can reach into git history to get the script back while we fix the issue. Thoughts?

I guess you are right we can reach back in history. (i was balking at first, since my most recent triage week went poorly, though IIRC that was for reasons unrelated to the endpoint vs triage script choice…)
Yeah - i think we should restore it if we run into major problems
I’ll also make a note to try to run the endpoint next week before you start the triage to make sure.
